TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class TypeInfo : Type, System.Reflection.IReflectableType
.class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit TypeInfo extends System.Type implements class System.Reflection.IReflectableType
Public MustInherit Class TypeInfo Inherits Type Implements IReflectableType
public ref class TypeInfo abstract : Type, System::Reflection::IReflectableType
type TypeInfo = class inherit Type interface IReflectableType

summary.span: 代表下列各項的類型宣告：類別類型、介面類型、陣列類型、值類型、列舉類型、型別參數、泛型類型定義，以及開放式或封閉式的建構泛型類型。

span.span: Represents type declarations for class types, interface types, array types, value types, enumeration types, type parameters, generic type definitions, and open or closed constructed generic types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，則類別納入[!INCLUDE[net_win8_profile](~/includes/net-win8-profile-md.md)]用於建立 Windows 市集應用程式的子集。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class is included in the [!INCLUDE[net_win8_profile](~/includes/net-win8-profile-md.md)] subset for use in creating Windows Store apps. 在完整.NET Framework 中使用。 is available in the full .NET Framework as well. 如需反映的 Windows 市集應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱[System.Reflection 命名空間](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh441595\(v=vs.110\).aspx)Windows 開發人員中心和[.NET Framework 為 Windows 市集應用程式中的反映](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection-for-windows-store-apps.md)MSDN 中程式庫。For more information about reflection for Windows Store apps, see [System.Reflection namespaces](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh441595\(v=vs.110\).aspx) in the Windows Dev Center and [Reflection in the .NET Framework for Windows Store Apps](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection-for-windows-store-apps.md) in the MSDN Library. 包含許多適用於成員類別和反映內容中的許多[!INCLUDE[net_win8_profile](~/includes/net-win8-profile-md.md)]傳回的集合物件。 contains many of the members available in the class, and many of the reflection properties in the [!INCLUDE[net_win8_profile](~/includes/net-win8-profile-md.md)] return collections of objects. 若要取得物件從物件，請使用擴充方法。To get a object from a object, use the extension method. A物件都代表類型定義本身，而物件表示的型別定義的參考。A object represents the type definition itself, whereas a object represents a reference to the type definition. 取得物件會強制組件，其中包含要載入該型別。Getting a object forces the assembly that contains that type to load. 相較之下，您可以使用操作而不一定需要執行階段載入組件所參考的物件。In comparison, you can manipulate objects without necessarily requiring the runtime to load the assembly they reference. 在 [!INCLUDE[net_win8_profile](~/includes/net-win8-profile-md.md)]，您使用反映的屬性傳回集合而非傳回陣列的方法。In the [!INCLUDE[net_win8_profile](~/includes/net-win8-profile-md.md)], you use the reflection properties of that return collections instead of methods that return arrays. 例如，使用屬性來取得所有宣告的成員，或屬性來取得所有宣告的屬性。For example, use the property to get all declared members, or the property to get all declared properties. 反映內容可以針對大型組件或類型實作這些集合的消極式周遊。Reflection contexts can implement lazy traversal of these collections for large assemblies or types. 若要取得特定的成員，請使用方法這類和，並將傳遞的方法或您想要擷取的屬性名稱。To get specific members, use methods such as and , and pass the name of the method or property you would like to retrieve. 若要篩選的結果屬性，使用 LINQ 查詢。To filter the results of properties, use LINQ queries. 由執行階段產生的反映物件 (例如，因為`typeof(Object)`)，您可以使用中的方法來周遊繼承樹狀結構類別。For reflection objects that originate with the runtime (for example, as the result of `typeof(Object)`), you can traverse the inheritance tree by using the methods in the class. 來自自訂的反映內容的物件的取用者無法使用這些方法，而且必須周遊繼承樹狀結構本身。Consumers of objects from customized reflection contexts cannot use these methods and must traverse the inheritance tree themselves. ## Examples 此範例使用反映類型和中的成員[!INCLUDE[net_win8_profile](~/includes/net-win8-profile-md.md)]要擷取的方法和屬性的子集型別，包括繼承的方法和屬性。This example uses the reflection types and members in the [!INCLUDE[net_win8_profile](~/includes/net-win8-profile-md.md)] subset to retrieve the methods and properties of the type, including inherited methods and properties. 若要執行此程式碼，將它貼到的程式碼檔案[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]XAML 應用程式，其中包含[Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Textblock](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.xaml.controls.textblock.aspx)控制項，名為`textblock1`。To run this code, paste it into the code file for a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] XAML app that contains a [Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Textblock](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.ui.xaml.controls.textblock.aspx) control named `textblock1`. [!code-csharp[System.ReflectionWinStoreApp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflectionwinstoreapp/cs/mainpage.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ReflectionWinStoreApp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflectionwinstoreapp/vb/mainpage.xaml.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得目前類型所宣告之建構函式的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the constructors declared by the current type.

value.span: 目前類型所宣告之建構函式的集合。

span.span: A collection of the constructors declared by the current type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要篩選的結果屬性中，使用 LINQ 查詢。To filter the results of the property, use LINQ queries. 由執行階段產生的反映物件 (例如，因為`typeof(Object)`)，您可以使用中的方法來周遊繼承樹狀結構類別。For reflection objects that originate with the runtime (for example, as the result of `typeof(Object)`), you can traverse the inheritance tree by using the methods in the class. 來自自訂的反映內容的物件的取用者無法使用這些方法，而且必須周遊繼承樹狀結構本身。Consumers of objects from customized reflection contexts cannot use these methods and must traverse the inheritance tree themselves.

span.span: An array that contains the current instance's generic type parameters, or an array of zero if the current instance has no generic type parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
